history.proof: intros H. hfcrush use: list_bool_succ_neq_nil, list_bool_next_spec.

original: intros H. unfold not. intros H0. unfold list_bool_next in H0. destruct (list_bool_next_def l) as [l' H1]. unfold list_bool_succ in H1. apply list_bool_succ_neq_nil in H1. apply H0. rewrite H1. reflexivity.
